title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Forms Copilot can now help you collect responses on your forms
description: Copilot in Forms can now help you monitor and collect responses for your forms, so you can get the data you need on time. Copilot can send invitations, track your progress, and recommend follow-up actions such as reminders. Say goodbye to manual follow-ups and hello to smarter, stress-free data collection.
